alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 2:30AM CDT until June 02 at 7:56AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Augusta affecting Butler and Cowley Counties. For the Whitewater River...including Towanda, Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Augusta. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding of low lying areas can be expected, especially rural roads west of town approximately 1 mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 21.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Whitewater River Augusta 21.0 17.1 Wed 2 am CDT 19.9 13.0 9.3 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
